631.question: Why did they think this was a good idea?
631.response:
{'Image': 1, 'Rationale': 'Image 1 shows that the basic seq2seq model generates a much shorter answer compared to the reference and that the proposal generates the same answer as the reference. '}
The answer is : The proposal model was a good idea because it was able to generate the same answer as the reference answer while the basic seq2seq model was not able to do so.
631.answer: They think it will help human TCM practitioners make prescriptions.
